title: Enhancing Nursing Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Collaborative Learning: A Social Interaction and Civic Engagement Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice knowledge and clinical experience, along with foundational understanding of medical ethics and patient rights
context.additional_context: Blended delivery combining smartphone-based online platforms with a single offline workshop. Emphasizes real-time/asynchronous collaborative activities. Includes case analyses reflecting social responsibility and cultural sensitivity within medical institutions

learning_goals: Synthesizing Multiple Perspectives in Complex Clinical Scenarios to Establish Collaborative Problem-Solving Strategies and Cultivate Medical Team Citizenship
Exchanging Constructive Feedback with Peer Learners Using Online Discussion Tools and Refining Skills for Building Effective Communication Relationships in Healthcare Settings

Applying Effective Communication Techniques in Digital Collaboration Platforms (e.g., Mobile Messenger-Based Discussion Rooms) to Resolve Ambiguous Nursing Issues, Considering Principles of Patient Rights Protection

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
